subject: Music
title: Bob Marley: Voice of the Oppressed
description: A fast breakdown of Bob Marley: Voice of the Oppressed for builders.

hook.text: Bob Marley turned a tiny Caribbean island's music into a global voice for the powerless.

buildup.text: Growing up in the Trenchtown ghetto of Kingston, he fused ska, rocksteady, and Rastafari faith.

discovery.text: No Woman No Cry and One Love became anthems of hope for oppressed people everywhere.

twist.text: After an assassination attempt, he played a peace concert uniting warring political factions.

climax.text: He died of cancer at 36 â€” but his music has only grown more relevant since.

punchline.text: He sang for peace in a world at war. The world is still listening.
